title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 804.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 804.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to implement the provisions of
article 6-A of the Public Officers Law by establishing procedures under which a
data subject may have access to records maintained by the office pertaining to
such subject. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
804.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
